title: SRS Street Racing Syndicate - Racing Game 2005 [PC-Ver Eng]

============================================================================|

=>-Developer...............: Eutechnyx.
=>-Publisher...............: Namco.
=>-Platform................: Windows.
=>-Release date............: 2005.
=>-Genre...................: Racing.
=>-Mode....................: Single Player : Multi-Player.
=>-Media...................: CD X 2.

============================================================================|

The popularity of nitrous-fuelled street racing has exploded in recent 
years. For awhile, the only way import racing fans could get their fix was 
at unofficial "tracks" dotting the urban landscape. These midnight races 
presented a world of opportunity for fledgling racers: respect, riches and 
the flighty affections of high-maintenance women. Alas, the high-stakes 
lifestyle of the Fast and the Furious crowd isn't for everyone, and so 
Namco decided to release Street Racing Syndicate. With SRS, Namco set out 
to incorporate the nuances of real street racing. Instead of choosing the 
arcade route taken by the Need for Speed Underground series, Namco decided 
to pursue a racing experience grounded in reality.

============================================================================|

Recommended Specifications.
=>-OS..........: Microsoft Windows 98, 2000, XP, Vista, Win7, Win10.
=>-CPU.........: 2GHz Pentium 4.
=>-RAM.........: 512MB RAM.
=>-GRAPHICS....: 64 MB.
=>-ODD.........: 8x CD/DVD.
=>-HARD DRIVE..: 2 GB Free Space.
=>-NETWORKk....: TCP/IP.

============================================================================|

Install.
=>-Mount SRS1.iso to virtual drive and follow instructions
